title: Don’t Call Me By My Username! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Mature   Romance   School Life   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Character Growth   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   R-18   Slow Growth at Start   Student-Teacher Relationship   Teachers
author: 置鮎カンナ
description:
“What if I say it’s because I wanted to meet you, ‘Haru’?”

Akira, whom I met on a dating app and thought I would never see again, suddenly became a temporary teacher and showed up in front of me, Watase Takumi. Was it just a coincidence?

I don’t want to have anything to do with the guy who knows my dark past, but with Akira’s arrival, my once peaceful school life will change—.>
